protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -File extraextensiontest.ps1 -VMName ', parameters('virtualMachineNameExtra'), ' -GuestOSName ', parameters('virtualMachineNameExtra'), ' -StorageAccountName ', parameters('storageAccountName'), ' -StorageAccountKey ', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', parameters('storageAccountName')), providers('Microsoft.Storage', 'storageAccounts').apiVersions[0]).keys[0].value, ' -USERNAME ', parameters('adminUsername'), ' -PASSWORD ', parameters('adminPassword'))]
